name: Chimera (itch) (The Daigan)
description:
Create a game in 1 week with the theme CHIMERA.

Started off as a platform with 3 bosses, that then fuse into the CHIMERA

managed to only get to the first one

This is the first time I try to do the art myself (didn't turn out great but it's a start)

Hope you enjoy

Move with the ARROWS.

Jump with Z

Attack with X
